meanings.definition: To broadcast or transmit a program on television.
meanings.sent1: The station televises the news every evening.
meanings.sent2: She televises her favorite show every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems mesmerized when the TV televises a bird documentary.
meanings.sent4: His smile televises his happiness to the world.
meanings.sent5: The bright screen televises images of faraway lands.

meanings.sent1: He televises for hours without getting bored.
meanings.sent2: She televises after finishing her homework.
meanings.sent3: The dog barks at the TV when it televises a dog food commercial.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes televises the drama unfolding on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The family gathers around to televises their favorite show together.
